Settings
First Fragment

Previous
Hello first fragment
Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s
"I’m glad you made a new friend! What’s their name?"
And where are you and %1$s in your friendship?
Great, let’s put %1$s here.
"I’m sorry to hear that, are you sure?"
"I understand, friendships can be hard sometimes. I’m rooting for you!"
Okay, let me take care of it.
I noticed that you watered %1$s a lot recently, I’m glad your friendship is going strong. Remember though, relationships take time to grow, just like plants!
Hi there! What can I help you with today?
You can add a new plant, or grow a seed, by clicking on an empty pot. Each time you catch up with your friend, remember to come back and water the plant. Happy growing!

"Have you noticed your plants wilting? That’s what happens when you haven’t watered them in a while. This is a good reminder to schedule brunch to catch up or send a \“How are you doing?\” text to keep your friendship going strong!"
"I’m sorry to hear that there’s a plant you want to remove. Go to the plant’s page and click on the shovel icon. I’ll take care of it from there."
Staying connected to friends will help you lower stress, find support, and stay healthy!
Oh no your plant is wilting! Remember to catch up with %1$s soon, and then water your plant by clicking the water jug icon!
Wow! Your plant looks healthy. Cheers to %1$d days of friendship.
